<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ url_for('static', filename='common/code/bmco_general.js') }}"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ url_for('static', filename='common/code/bmco_gui.js') }}" ></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ url_for('static', filename='common/code/bmco_pagetabs.js') }}" ></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ url_for('static', filename='common/code/bmco_xml.js') }}"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ url_for('static', filename='common/code/vkbeautify.js') }}"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ url_for('static', filename='editor/bmco_myartgallery/myag_user/settings.js') }}"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ url_for('static', filename='editor/bmco_myartgallery/myag_code/myag_panel.js') }}"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ url_for('static', filename='editor/bmco_myartgallery/myag_code/myag_main.js') }}"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ url_for('static', filename='editor/bmco_myartgallery/myag_code/myag_editor.js') }}"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		SETTING_pagingIndex = "append";
		GLOBAL_workingFile = "{{ remote_database }}";
		SETTING_remoteImageHost = "{{ remote_location }}";
		bmco_tab_init("artworks");
	myag_ed_startup();
	</script>
